shadcn.import: import { ChartContainer, ChartTooltip, ChartTooltipContent, ChartLegend, ChartLegendContent } from '@/components/ui/chart'
shadcn.chartImport: import { AreaChart, BarChart, LineChart, PieChart, RadarChart, RadialBarChart, Area, Bar, Line, Pie, Radar, RadialBar, XAxis, YAxis, CartesianGrid, PolarGrid, PolarAngleAxis, PolarRadiusAxis } from 'recharts'

config.description: Record<string, { label: string; color: string; icon?: ComponentType }>

vlting.import: import { Chart, ChartTooltip, ChartLegend, ChartDataTable, AreaChart, BarChart, LineChart, PieChart, RadarChart, RadialChart } from '@vlting/ui'

config.description: Record<string, { label: string; color: string; icon?: ComponentType }>

accessibilityLabel.description: Required ARIA label for the chart container

data.description: Optional data for hidden screen reader accessibility table

xAxisKey.description: Key for the x-axis column in the data table (default: 'x')

variant.description: 9 variants: default, cursor, dot, line, label, custom, advanced, icons, formatter
10 variants: default, gradient, stacked, expanded, step, axes, interactive, legend, linear, icons
10 variants: default, horizontal, stacked, grouped, negative, label, mixed, custom-label, active, interactive
10 variants: default, dots, multiple, labels, stepped, custom-dots, interactive, linear, legend, icons
11 variants: default, donut, donut-text, donut-active, label, custom-label, label-list, legend, separator, interactive, stacked
14 variants: default, dots, lines, custom, multiple, grid-circle, grid-filled, grid-none, legend, icons, radius-axis, label, custom-shape, interactive
6 variants: default, grid, label, stacked, text, shape

notes: shadcn uses Recharts (web DOM-based, browser only); vlting uses Victory Native + react-native-svg (cross-platform: web + React Native).
shadcn's ChartContainer wraps Recharts ResponsiveContainer; vlting's Chart uses ResizeObserver for responsive sizing on web.
shadcn uses CSS custom properties (--color-{key}) for chart colors; vlting resolves Tamagui design tokens (e.g., '$blue8') to hex colors via ChartContext.
vlting Chart provides useChartContext() hook giving child components access to config, resolvedColors, victoryTheme, dimensions, and reducedMotion.
vlting uses a variant prop pattern: instead of composing Recharts primitives (<Area>, <Bar>, <Line>), each chart type accepts a variant prop that configures the rendering mode.
shadcn composes Recharts primitives inside chart wrappers (<BarChart><Bar /><XAxis /></BarChart>); vlting provides pre-composed chart components with variant-driven configuration.
vlting PieChart, RadarChart, and RadialChart use custom SVG rendering via react-native-svg rather than Victory's built-in polar chart components, for full cross-platform control.
vlting Chart requires an accessibilityLabel prop and supports an optional data prop for a hidden screen reader data table — no equivalent in shadcn.
vlting includes prefers-reduced-motion support via useChartContext().reducedMotion — no equivalent in shadcn.
All 69 shadcn chart demo variants (10 area + 10 bar + 10 line + 11 pie + 14 radar + 6 radial) have vlting equivalents, plus 8 tooltip variants.

breaking.reason: Renamed component; accessibilityLabel is required for ARIA compliance
Pre-composed component with config object instead of child primitives
Cross-platform design token system replaces CSS custom properties
Variant-based API instead of render prop composition
Self-contained component; config comes from ChartContext
Cross-platform compatibility; no className support in React Native
Grid rendering is a boolean prop, not a separate composed component
